mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raffle_activity_account_day (user_id, activity_id, day, day_count, day_count_surplus, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{day}, #{dayCount}, #{dayCountSurplus}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE day_count = day_count + VALUES(day_count), day_count_surplus = day_count_surplus + VALUES(day_count_surplus), update_time = NOW()
